description.narrative: This activity (Economic Policy Reform Initiative) is a component of Accelerating Investment and Infrastructure in Nepal reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £10,517,772. This component benefits Nepal, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 10-05-2012 and the end date is 31-03-2023.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
